txt.en: Turned to evil by a spirit impersonating their long-dead lord, Skorgrím, the Dourhands proved themselves to be useful servants of the Iron Crown. Following Skorgrím's defeat at Gabilazan, however, Brathar Crack-helm and the Dourhands began to suspect that they had been deceived and swore vengeance upon the Angmarim.
Defeat many Dourhands in Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire.
Tûr Fúar, the Drearspire -- Doom of the Dourhands
